participant_1.name: Ethan Carter
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, he is focused on achieving his career goals and is often seen as confident and assertive.
participant_1.background: my parents are very wealthy bankers. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i plan to go to business school next year. i drive a bmw.

participant_2.name: Sofia Garcia
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, she enjoys teaching and finds joy in helping others learn and grow.
participant_2.background: my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week. my favorite colors are red and silver. i'm fluent in english, spanish, and french. i'm an elementary school teacher.
